config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration _journalSizeThreshold is used in the code to specify the size threshold for the journal. It is passed as a parameter when creating a PersistentJournal object.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The configuration _journalSizeThreshold is triggered whenever the journal is created, which typically happens when the application starts up or when a new journal is needed.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The value of _journalSizeThreshold impacts the size of the journal file. A smaller threshold may result in more frequent journal file rotations, while a larger threshold may result in larger journal files and potentially slower performance.
